titles.title: To designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse located at 1125 Chapline Street in Wheeling, West Virginia, as the "Frederick P. Stamp, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2082)
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

bill.summary: 11/17/2011--Introduced. Designates the federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 1125 Chapline Street in Wheeling, West Virginia, as the "Frederick P. Stamp, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse."
